original_text: Look! Our brave soldiers are calling out in the streets. The people that we sent to make peace with our enemies are weeping. Look! Our brave soldiers are calling out in the streets. The people that we sent to make peace with our enemies are weeping. Look! Our brave soldiers are calling out in the streets.
korean_text: 보라 그들의 용사가 밖에서 부르짖으며 평화의 사신들이 슬피 곡하며

sentences.original_text: Our brave soldiers are calling out in the streets.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 용감한 군사들이 거리에서 부르짖고 있다.

sentences.original_text: to make peace with our enemies
